title: Nishant P.
text:
I am a PhD student in Computational Biology, currently based in [City/University]. My research lives at the intersection of microbial genomics and high-throughput data analysis, where I work on decoding the chemical conversations of soil bacteria.
Beyond the lab, my life is defined by the rhythms of Indian classical arts. As a Hindustani Classical Musician and Kathak Dancer, I find that the precision of a Raag or the mathematical complexity of a Taal mirrors the structured logic of the biological systems I study.



Research: Deciphering mass spectrometry data for microbial interactions.
Music: Exploring the depth of [Your Specific Raag interests].
Life: Training for my next race and experimenting with low-carb sourdough.

Contact Me

title: Music
text:
Music is more than just a hobby; it’s a language I use to explore emotion and storytelling. Whether I’m on stage or in the studio, the goal is always to connect.



Guitar: Rhythm & Lead (Acoustic/Electric)
Vocals: Tenor/Baritone range
Production: Logic Pro X, Ableton Live










NoteListen Now



Check out my latest tracks on SoundCloud or watch performances on YouTube.

title: Dance
text:
Dance is the physical expression of the music I love. It’s about precision, flow, and the raw energy of the beat.





Focusing on isolation, groove, and musicality. Influenced by old school and modern urban styles.



Exploring fluidity and narrative through movement.











TipWatch



Videos of recent performances will be uploaded here shortly.



“Dance is the hidden language of the soul.”
